Server.Name: Undead Legacy Experimental
Server.Description:
Requirements: A20.0 (b238) and Easy AntiCheat must be turned OFF.
Features: - Unique User Interface with advanced quality of life improvements - Unique weight based encumbrance system with 300 backpack slots - Advanced lockpicking minigame and repairable vehicle system - Advanced progression and crafting system with research and action skills - Advanced world interaction system when gathering liquids like water, fuel, coffee, beer etc - Over 800 new items and blocks, including things like weapons, tools, resources, building blocks etc
Website: https://ul.subquake.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/bGd5QTreUf
Donations: https://www.paypal.me/Subquake https://www.patreon.com/subquake
